data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 113,200 people living in Paysandú.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paysandú, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Paysandú.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Paysandú to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Paysandú, Uruguay and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Puerto Yeruá
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Puerto Yeruá, Paysandú, Uruguay.
Father, move the 8,258 believers in the state of Paysandú to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Paysandú, Uruguay need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paysandú, Uruguay has a population of 113,200.

We estimate Paysandú has 8,258 people who might know Jesus, 67,049 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,893 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Paysandú prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
